Segment.name: ADT
Segment.comment: Report the parturition status for the parent animal

Field.name: ParturitionStatusCode
Field.comment: Code identifying a parturition or birth delivery status

Field.name: Date1
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: TestPeriodOrIntervalValue1
Field.comment: Numeric value of period or interval signifying when a test event occurs

Field.name: UnitOfTimePeriodOrInterval1
Field.comment: Code indicating the time period or interval

Field.name: Date2
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: TestPeriodOrIntervalValue2
Field.comment: Numeric value of period or interval signifying when a test event occurs

Field.name: UnitOfTimePeriodOrInterval2
Field.comment: Code indicating the time period or interval

Field.name: Time
Field.comment: Time expressed in 24-hour clock time as follows: HHMM, or HHMMSS, or HHMMSSD, or HHMMSSDD, where H = hours (00-23), M = minutes (00-59), S = integer seconds (00-59) and DD = decimal seconds; decimal seconds are expressed as follows: D = tenths (0-9) and DD = hundredths (00-99)

Field.name: TestPeriodOrIntervalValue3
Field.comment: Numeric value of period or interval signifying when a test event occurs

Field.name: UnitOfTimePeriodOrInterval3
Field.comment: Code indicating the time period or interval

SyntaxNote.name: P0304
SyntaxNote.comment: If either ADT03 or ADT04 is present, then the other is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P0607
SyntaxNote.comment: If either ADT06 or ADT07 is present, then the other is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P0910
SyntaxNote.comment: If either ADT09 or ADT10 is present, then the other is required.
